Grand MasterAnswered on 16 Sep 2019Using a SGD credit card usually incurs around 1% (currency conversion fee) +2% (bank admin fee) = 3%The forex rate is usually not that favourable, roughly 0.6% additional costs.So a total of roughly 3.6% additional costs on most credit card (NOTE: this is average, different bank charges different, some charge a bit more... some charge a LOT more)You can google for most bank charges. For peace of mind, you may just stick to youtrip or its rivals.0 comments1
